document.discussion_title: TESLA charging program comes in Europe
document.topic_text: TESLA charging program comes in Europe TESLA charging program comes in Europe Tesla announced its charging program will be available for Tesla Model S and Model X owners to facilitate long distance trips with 200 stations throughout resorts and hotels in 14 European countries. With this program Tesla customers have access to additional charging points located on attractions or resort areas in 14 countries in Europe. Once charged Tesla’s have more than 100 km autonomy range per hour of charging. The Tesla charging network exists in North America with close to 1.900 sites, in the Asia-Pacific region with over 700 equipped sites and since its launching in 2014 reached about 2600 sites worldwide. In France, 29 charging stations exist and hundreds more will join the program in the following months. Other charging stations exist in Italy, Belgium and London.
